Version getVersion()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.Exception,
                          GatewayException
Retrieves the version and the main informations of the GAL. It can be used as a way to tell if and when the GAL is running as it does not affect the status of the GAL and it is a very light command

leaveSync

Status leaveSync(long timeout,
                 Address addrOfInterest,
                 int mask)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.Exception,
                        GatewayException
It�s a command to generate the disassociation of a node from the network ZigBee. Mask equals to 0x00 close the network, 0xff leaves the network open, and any other value leaves the network open for that number of seconds.

Parameters:
timeout -
addrOfInterest -
mask -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.Exception
GatewayException
